subject: College Athletics
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
Football
lead_paragraph: The University of Iowa told the N.C.A.A. that it allowed two recruits to meet Ashton Kutcher and Demi Moore at a football game against Iowa State in September.
snippet: The University of Iowa told the N.C.A.A. that it allowed two recruits to meet Ashton Kutcher and Demi Moore at a football game against Iowa State in September.
